subsections.title: Metric Units (k, M, etc.)
subsections.label: subsec:metric
prompts: Explain the concept of metric prefixes and their significance in radio technology.
Describe the process of converting between different units of electrical measurements, such as amperes to milliamperes.
Discuss the importance of understanding frequency units like hertz, kilohertz, and megahertz in radio communications.
Provide examples of how to convert between units of voltage, such as volts to kilovolts and microvolts.
Explain the relationship between milliwatts and watts, and how to perform conversions between these units.
Describe the significance of picofarads in capacitance and how to convert them to microfarads.
Discuss the practical applications of understanding frequency conversions, such as converting MHz to kHz and GHz.
